temperature_initial.description: Temperature for initial model generation. Controls diversity/randomness of valid code.

temperature_mutation.description: Temperature for mutation (evolve_model). Lower means more conservative edits.

max_generations.description: Maximum number of generations to run the evolution.

mutation_rate.description: Probability of choosing mutation over crossover when reproducing.

crossover_rate.description: Probability of choosing crossover. (Should theoretically sum to 1 with mutation, or be handled as ratio).

selection_temperature.description: Adaptive Scaling Factor for Softmax. effective_T = T * std(log_fitness). T=1.0 implies standard Softmax on Z-scores of log-fitness.

n_iterations_stagnation.description: Stopping criterion: number of generations without global improvement before stopping.

init_population_capacity.description: Initial number of individuals per island.

N_parents_crossover.description: Number of parents on which to perform crossover.

max_capacity_island.description: Maximum number of individuals on an island.

overall_instructions.value: Using the problem description, reason to find a mechanistic model that could explain the observed dynamics. Do not be afraid to include non-linearities.
overall_instructions.description: Specific instructions that can be specific to the studied problem.

initial_generation.value: Propose mechanistic models that could explain the observed dynamics based on the problem description, possibly introducing latent variables if the system seems under-specified.
initial_generation.description: Instruction for the initial model generation.

mutation.value: Perform a mutation operation on these dynamics, ie Change its dynamics to propose a new ODE system

crossover.value: Perform a crossover operation on the proposals given.
